Package Model

Class Plant

java.lang.Object
Model.Container
Model.EntityActions
Model.Plant
public class Plant extends EntityActions
Represents a plant entity in the game, extending EntityActions. This class manages the plant's state, cooldowns, observers, and behaviors.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Builder class for creating Plant instances.

    Director class for constructing specific types of plants.

  • Constructor Details

    • Plant

      public Plant(int teamID, int positionX, int positionY, String name, String description, int health, int damage, Projectile projectile, Model.EntityBehavior behavior, double averageActionSpeed)
      Constructs a Plant with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      teamID - the ID of the team this plant belongs to
      positionX - the x-coordinate of the plant's position
      positionY - the y-coordinate of the plant's position
      name - the name of the plant
      description - a description of the plant
      health - the health of the plant
      damage - the damage dealt by the plant
      projectile - the projectile used by the plant
      behavior - the behavior of the plant
      averageActionSpeed - the average action speed of the plant
